flavor_text_entries.flavor_text:
頭に　ついた　長い　つるを　小さな
生き物の　ように　動かし　獲物を　誘う。
近づいてきた　ところを　ぱくりと　ひとの 。

Victreebel has a long vine that extends from its head.
This vine is waved and flicked about as if it were an animal
to attract prey. When an unsuspecting prey draws near,
this Pokémon swallows it whole.

Victreebel è dotato di una lunga liana che parte dalla testa.
Il Pokémon la sventola e la agita come fosse un’esca
per attirare la preda. Quando la preda ignara si avvicina,
il Pokémon la inghiotte in un sol boccone.

Victreebel tiene una enredadera que le sale de la cabeza y
que agita a modo de señuelo para atraer a sus presas y así
engullirlas por sorpresa cuando estas se aproximan incautas.

Aus Sarzenias Kopf ragt eine lange Ranke hervor, die es
bewegt, als wäre sie ein kleines Lebewesen. Nähert sich
ahnungslose Beute dieser Falle, verschlingt Sarzenia
sie im Ganzen.

Empiflor est doté d’une longue liane qui part de sa tête.
Cette liane se balance et remue comme un animal pour attirer
ses proies. Lorsque l’une d’elles s’approche un peu trop près,
ce Pokémon l’avale entièrement.

머리에 달린 긴 덩굴을 작은
생물처럼 움직여서 먹이를 유인한다.
가까이 왔을 때 덥석 한 번에 삼킨다.

あたまに　ついた　ながい　つるを　ちいさな
いきものの　ように　うごかし　えものを　さそう。
ちかづいてきた　ところを　ぱくりと　ひとの 。

頭に　ついた　長い　つるを　小さな
生き物の　ように　動かし　獲物を　誘う。
近づいてきた　ところを　ぱくりと　ひとの 。

Victreebel has a long vine that extends from its head.
This vine is waved and flicked about as if it were an animal to
attract prey. When an unsuspecting prey draws near, this
Pokémon swallows it whole.

Victreebel è dotato di una lunga liana che parte dalla testa.
Il Pokémon la sventola e la agita come fosse un’esca
per attirare la preda. Quando la preda ignara
si avvicina, il Pokémon la inghiotte in un sol boccone.

Victreebel tiene una enredadera que le sale de la cabeza y
que agita a modo de señuelo para atraer a sus presas y así
engullirlas por sorpresa cuando estas se aproximan incautas.

Aus Sarzenias Kopf ragt eine lange Ranke hervor, die es
bewegt, als wäre sie ein kleines Lebewesen. Nähert sich
ahnungslose Beute dieser Falle, verschlingt Sarzenia
sie im Ganzen.

Empiflor est doté d’une longue liane qui part de sa tête.
Cette liane se balance et remue comme un animal pour attirer
ses proies. Lorsque l’une d’elles s’approche un peu trop près,
ce Pokémon l’avale entièrement.

머리에 달린 긴 덩굴을 작은
생물처럼 움직여서 먹이를 유인한다.
가까이 왔을 때 덥석 한 번에 삼킨다.

あたまに　ついた　ながい　つるを　ちいさな
いきものの　ように　うごかし　えものを　さそう。
ちかづいてきた　ところを　ぱくりと　ひとの 。

体内に　取りこまれた　ものは
どんなに　硬くても　溶解液で
跡形なく　溶かされてしまう。

Once ingested into this Pokémon’s body,
even the hardest object will melt into nothing.

Anche l’oggetto più resistente si scioglie non appena
viene ingerito da questo Pokémon.

Cuando este Pokémon ingiere algo, incluso el objeto
más duro se disolverá al instante.

Selbst die härtesten Objekte werden zersetzt,
wenn der Körper sie erst aufgenommen hat.

Tout corps ingéré par ce Pokémon est
systématiquement dissous en bouillie.

체내로 거둬들인 것은
아무리 단단할지라도 용해액으로
흔적도 없이 녹여버린다.

たいないに　とりこまれた　ものは
どんなに　かたくても　ようかいえきで
あとかたなく　とかされてしまう。

ジャングルの　奥地に　ウツボット
ばかり　いる　地帯が　あって
行ったら　２度と　帰ってこれない。

Said to live in huge colonies deep in jungles,
although no one has ever returned from there.

Pare che viva in grandi colonie nel cuore della giungla,
ma nessuno è mai tornato da lì per raccontarlo.

Dicen que vive en grandes colonias en el interior de
las junglas, aunque nadie ha podido verificarlo.

Dieses Pokémon soll in großen Kolonien
tief im Dschungel leben, doch niemand
kann dies bestätigen.

On dit qu’il vit en colonie dans la jungle, mais
personne n’en est jamais revenu vivant pour
le confirmer.

정글의 안쪽에 우츠보트만
있는 지대가 있어서
한 번 가면 두 번 다시 돌아올 수 없다.

ジャングルの　おくちに　ウツボット
ばかり　いる　ちたいが　あって
いったら　２どと　かえってこれない。

It pools in its mouth a fluid with
a honey-like scent, which is really
an acid that dissolves anything.

It pools in its mouth a fluid with
a honey-like scent, which is really
an acid that dissolves anything.

It pools in its mouth a fluid with
a honeylike scent, which is really
an acid that dissolves anything.

Sa bouche sécrète un fluide à
l’odeur de miel, qui s’avère être
un acide extrêmement corrosif.

It pools in its mouth a fluid with
a honeylike scent, which is really
an acid that dissolves anything.

Sa bouche sécrète un fluide à
l’odeur de miel, qui s’avère être
un acide extrêmement corrosif.

This horrifying plant Pokémon attracts
prey with aromatic honey,
then melts them in its mouth.

Acid that has dissolved many prey
becomes sweeter, making it even
more effective at attracting prey.

It pools in its mouth a fluid with
a honeylike scent, which is really
an acid that dissolves anything.

It pools in its mouth a fluid with
a honeylike scent, which is really
an acid that dissolves anything.

It pools in its mouth a fluid with
a honeylike scent, which is really
an acid that dissolves anything.

Said to live in huge colonies deep in
jungles, although no one has ever
returned from there.

Lures prey into its mouth with a honeylike
aroma. The helpless prey is melted with
a dissolving fluid.

The long vine extending from its head is
waved about as if it were a living thing to
attract prey. When an unsuspecting victim
approaches, it is swallowed whole.

VICTREEBEL has a long vine that
extends from its head. This vine is
waved and flicked about as if it were an animal to attract prey. When an
unsuspecting prey draws near, this
POKéMON swallows it whole.

POKéMON swallows it whole.

becomes sweeter, making it even

Lures prey with
the sweet aroma of
honey. Swallowed whole, the prey is
melted in a day,
bones and all.
